title: 108_hr3052
content: The Act titled "State Accountability and Identity Fraud Elimination Act of 2004" allows for the withholding of funds for the enactment of a law that permits the issuance of identification cards or driver's licenses for certain individuals. The "State Accountability and Identity Fraud Elimination Act of 2004" allows withholding funds from states that enact laws allowing issuance of identification cards or driver's licenses for certain individuals. The Secretary will withhold increasing percentages of funds from states under specified conditions in fiscal years 2006, 2007, and 2008. In fiscal years 2006, 2007, 2008, and 2009, the Secretary will withhold increasing percentages of funds from states that have enacted laws allowing issuance of identification cards or driver's licenses for certain individuals. The Secretary will withhold 25 percent of funds from states that have enacted laws allowing issuance of identification cards or driver's licenses to unauthorized aliens. The Secretary will withhold funds from states allowing issuance of IDs or licenses to unauthorized aliens, with funds available for a limited period based on compliance. The Secretary will withhold funds from states allowing issuance of IDs or licenses to unauthorized aliens, with funds available for a limited period based on compliance. If a state repeals the law, the withheld funds will be apportioned back to the state and remain available for expenditure for three fiscal years. Unspent funds after this period will expire. The Secretary will withhold funds from states for issuing IDs to unauthorized aliens. If a state repeals the law, funds will be returned and available for expenditure for three fiscal years. Unspent funds will expire after this period. The Secretary will withhold funds from states for issuing IDs to unauthorized aliens. If a state repeals the law, funds will be returned and available for expenditure for three fiscal years. Unspent funds will expire after this period. Withholding of funds for enactment of a law allowing issuance of identification cards or drivers' licenses for certain individuals.
